metadata.title: CVE-2024-47176 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple bugs leading to info leak and remote code execution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups-browsed - 2.0.0-0ubuntu10.1
cups-browsed-tests - 2.0.0-0ubuntu10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups-browsed package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-0ubuntu10.1').
